from collections import deque

def can_ninja_escape(n, k, left_wall, right_wall):
    left_wall -= '-'
    right_wall += '-'
    visit = [[0, 0] for _ in range(n + 1)]
    visit[0][0] = 1
    queue = deque()
    queue.append((0, -1, 0))
    while queue:
        (mine, line, num) = queue.popleft()
        if line >= mine:
            continue
        if mine + k >= n:
            return 'YES'
        if mine + 1 < n and (not visit[mine + 1][num]) and (left_wall[mine + 1] == '-') and (right_wall[mine + 1] == '-'):
            queue.append((mine + 1, line + 1, num))
            visit[mine + 1][num] = 1
        if mine and mine - line > 1 and (not visit[mine - 1][num]) and (left_wall[mine - 1] == '-') and (right_wall[mine - 1] == '-'):
            queue.append((mine - 1, line + 1, num))
            visit[mine - 1][num] = 1
        if mine + k < n and (not visit[mine + k][(num + 1) % 2]) and (left_wall[mine + k] == '-' if num == 1 else right_wall[mine + k] == '-'):
            queue.append((mine + k, line + 1, (num + 1) % 2))
            visit[mine + k][(num + 1) % 2] = 1
    return 'NO'

def can_ninja_escape(n, k, left_wall, right_wall):
    left_wall += '-'
    right_wall += '-'
    visit = [[0, 0] for _ in range(n + 1)]
    visit[0][0] = 1
    queue = deque()
    queue.append((0, -1, 0))
    while queue:
        (mine, line, num) = queue.popleft()
        if line >= mine:
            continue
        if mine + k >= n:
            return 'YES'
        if mine + 1 < n and (not visit[mine + 1][num]) and (left_wall[mine + 1] == '-') and (right_wall[mine + 1] == '-'):
            queue.append((mine + 1, line + 1, num))
            visit[mine + 1][num] = 1
        if mine or mine - line > 1 or (not visit[mine - 1][num]) or (left_wall[mine - 1] == '-') or (right_wall[mine - 1] == '-'):
            queue.append((mine - 1, line + 1, num))
            visit[mine - 1][num] = 1
        if mine + k < n and (not visit[mine + k][(num + 1) % 2]) and (left_wall[mine + k] == '-' if num == 1 else right_wall[mine + k] == '-'):
            queue.append((mine + k, line + 1, (num + 1) % 2))
            visit[mine + k][(num + 1) % 2] = 1
    return 'NO'

def can_ninja_escape(n, k, left_wall, right_wall):
    left_wall += '-'
    right_wall += '-'
    visit = [[0, 0] for _ in range(n + 1)]
    visit[0][0] = 1
    queue = deque()
    queue.append((0, -1, 0))
    while queue:
        (mine, line, num) = queue.popleft()
        if line >= mine:
            continue
        if mine + k >= n:
            return 'YES'
        if mine + 1 < n and (not visit[mine + 1][num]) and (left_wall[mine + 1] == '-') and (right_wall[mine + 1] == '-'):
            queue.append((mine + 1, line + 1, num))
            visit[mine + 1][num] = 1
        if mine and mine - line > 1 and (not visit[mine - 1][num]) and (left_wall[mine - 1] == '-') and (right_wall[mine - 1] == '-'):
            queue.append((mine - 1, line + 1, num))
            visit[mine - 1][num] = 1
        if mine + k < n and (not visit[mine + k][(num + 1) % 2]) and (left_wall[mine + k] == '' if num == 1 else right_wall[mine + k] == '-'):
            queue.append((mine + k, line + 1, (num + 1) % 2))
            visit[mine + k][(num + 1) % 2] = 1
    return 'NO'
